abstract: Gonzalo Antonio Fierro Caniullán (born 21 March 1983) is a Chilean footballer. He currently plays as a right winger for the Chilean club Colo-Colo. Previously, he already had played for Chile's major club for almost seven seasons. In his native country he is known as "El Joven Pistolero", which means the young sniper, due to the accuracy of his shots.
